1.name: Auto-loader
1.desc: This weapon gains the Ceaseless special rule.

2.name: Flux Capacitor
2.desc: This weapon gains the P1 critical hit rule.

3.name: Rending Rounds
3.desc: This weapon gains the Rending special rule.

4.name: Propulsion Amplifier
4.desc: Add 1 to both Damage characteristics of this weapon.

5.name: Thermal Sight
5.desc: This weapon gains the No Cover special rule.

6.name: Seeker Spirit
6.desc: Each time a friendly operative makes a shooting attack with this weapon, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that shooting attack, for each critical hit you retain, you can re-roll one of your attack dice.

7.name: Power Enhancer
7.desc: Add 1 to both Damage characteristics of this weapon.

8.name: Inertia Displacer
8.desc: This weapon gains the Brutal special rule.

9.name: Perfectly Weighted
9.desc: This weapon gains the Balanced special rule.

10.name: Rending Blade
10.desc: This weapon gains the Rending special rule.

11.name: Monomolecular Edge
11.desc: This weapon gains the Lethal 5+ special rule.

12.name: Arc Unit
12.desc: This weapon gains the Stun critical hit rule.
